room_title: Escape room "Arizona Shootout" by Escapology Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: Amazing experience and staff. Was made to feel welcomed as soon as we arrived.  We did the Arizona shootout, it was so much fun. I love the team building aspect and the interaction. Can't wait to return for another game. It's a must when in Vegas.

room_title: Escape room "Arizona Shootout" by Escapology Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: I was in Vegas for a business trip and we attended Escapology as a team building activity. We did the Arizona shoot-out room. This is my second escape room and it a lot of fun. We were a 5 person team and I think that was perfect for the room. We escaped with 12 minutes left on the clock.I would highly recommend Escapology and I will definitely be back next time I'm in Vegas. Check it out. You won't be disappointed.

room_title: Escape room "Arizona Shootout" by Escapology Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: The waiting area is so cool! Being a steampunk fan it was right up my alley! :) A lot of fun had after that in the Shootout.

room_title: Escape room "Arizona Shootout" by Escapology Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: Loved the Wild Wild West atmosphere! We put our marshals' badges on and caught the culprits! Loved every minute, thanks Escapology!
